meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>simplify a fraction of fraction sums with multiple variables</term>, like turning <inline-math/> into the single fraction <inline-math/>. This includes <skill-link>adding/subtracting fractions</skill-link> and subsequently <skill-link>simplifying the fraction of fractions</skill-link>. The skill does not require <skill-link>expanding brackets</skill-link> or other derived operations.</par>
